18 #ifndef GANDIVA_FUNCTION_SIGNATURE_H
19 #define GANDIVA_FUNCTION_SIGNATURE_H
20 
21 #include <sstream>
22 #include <string>
23 #include <vector>
24 
25 #include "gandiva/arrow.h"
26 #include "gandiva/logging.h"
27 
28 namespace gandiva {
29 
32 class FunctionSignature {
33  public:
34  FunctionSignature(const std::string& base_name, const DataTypeVector& param_types,
35  DataTypePtr ret_type)
36  : base_name_(base_name), param_types_(param_types), ret_type_(ret_type) {
37  DCHECK_GT(base_name.length(), 0);
38  for (auto it = param_types_.begin(); it != param_types_.end(); it++) {
39  DCHECK(*it);
40  }
41  DCHECK(ret_type);
42  }
43 
44  bool operator==(const FunctionSignature& other) const;
45 
48  std::size_t Hash() const;
49 
50  DataTypePtr ret_type() const { return ret_type_; }
51 
52  const std::string& base_name() const { return base_name_; }
53 
54  DataTypeVector param_types() const { return param_types_; }
55 
56  std::string ToString() const;
57 
58  private:
59  // TODO : for some of the types, this shouldn't match type specific data. eg. for
60  // decimals, this shouldn't match precision/scale.
61  bool DataTypeEquals(const DataTypePtr left, const DataTypePtr right) const {
62  return left->Equals(right);
63  }
64 
65  std::string base_name_;
66  DataTypeVector param_types_;
67  DataTypePtr ret_type_;
68 };
69 
70 } // namespace gandiva
71 
72 #endif // GANDIVA_FUNCTION_SIGNATURE_H
